Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This product is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled benefits that can significantly enhance your experience. Given its unique features and the extensive research and development that went into it, we believe its value exceeds $12000. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering it at an exclusive price of $15000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this investment in excellence. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
